AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: Government agent who questioned Williams and McMillon, asked for consent to search the tractor's sleeper area
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: individual being questioned by Agent Pena, driver of the tractor-trailer, gave consent for the search
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: individual being questioned by Agent Pena, passenger in the tractor-trailer, attempted to pull down the fold-up bed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Manuel Hernandez: Government agent working with a dog during the checkpoint stop, alerted Agent Pena to check the back of the tractor
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon and Zeba Williams: pair being questioned by Agent Pena about their travel plans and citizenship
